name: Webydo.
tag_list: design, web-design, graphic-design, website-design, create-a-website, build-a-website, make-a-website
overview:
Revolution Time - - Webydo revolutionizes professional web creation, providing graphic designers with total creative freedom and independence.

…

WYSIWYG for Pros - - Webydo’s professional SaaS platform enables designers to create and manage cross-platform business websites, without writing code. With Webydo, designers have complete control over the entire design process, using a powerful WYSIWYG (What-You-See-Is-What-You-Get) design interface that finally meets the needs of professional users.

…

The Problem - - Designers wishing to create professional websites are enslaved to an old process that depends on handwritten code produced by developers. This process is slow, expensive and cumbersome, marginalizing designers’ role and preventing direct communication between designers and their clients.

…

The Solution - - Webydo solves this problem with a sophisticated DMS (Design Management System) that liberates designers from their dependency on handwritten code or limiting DIY templates. Using this sophisticated online software designers can bring any design to life and with a click of a button, an advanced HTML website is published online including a friendly built-in CMS (Content Management System) for the website owner. No programming or technical knowledge is needed. Designers can finally focus on the creative side!

Behind the scenes, Webydo’s innovative code generator automatically generates both an HTML website updated to the latest industry standards, cross all browsers & platforms and optimized for SEO, and a friendly built-in WYSIWYG CMS that enables the website owner to update the website content, independently.

…

By Designers, For Designers - - Webydo is a work of love of a community of designers. Every feature in the system was developed with designers needs in mind, and Webydo’s devoted community of designers participates in the company development process.

…

Webydo empowers designers by eliminating all technical barriers, encouraging the creation of a better web for us all!

Join us – www.webydo.com

milestones.description: US launch of Webydo's platform for designers. More than 50,000 Webydo websites on platform.
Strategic partnership with Google in the GBO (Getting Businesses Online) project offering Webydo’s SaaS solution, leading to the rapid creation of 40,000 new Webydo websites.
Microsoft ThinkNext 2012 - Webydo was chosen as one the 20 most innovative technologies & won the Audience Choice award.
Selected by TechCrunch as one of the most promising startups for 2010 - TWS Conference, 2010.

video_embeds.embed_code: Freedom of Web Design from Webydo on Vimeo.

external_links.title: Webydo Makes It Easier For Designers To Build Websites By Creating The Code For Them
Already powering 50k sites, Webydo launches its ‘code-free’ website making service in beta
Thanks To Israeli Startup Webydo, Great Designers Don’t Need To Know Code
Webydo Makes Creating Websites Super Easy With Its Design Studio
